trans-unit.source: Stud.IP data
Includes data from Stud.IP, like course or person lists.

Debug output?:Setting this produces output about what data is called from Stud.IP and how it is processed in the extension.

Relative path to REST API:Stud.IP 3.0 and onwards have a REST API built into the core which can be reached via the api.php dispatcher. There is also a REST plugin which is typically reachable via plugins.php/restipplugin.
Username for API access:To access the Stud.IP REST API, a username is needed. You can get it from your local Stud.IP root administrator.
Password for API access:To access the Stud.IP REST API, a password is needed. You can get it from your local Stud.IP root administrator.
Stud.IP URL:Full URL to your Stud.IP installation, including any sub directories.

Address of this web site (optional):By specifying an address here you can override the "magic" that determines the current site address. For example, your TYPO3 installation actually lies under http://typo3.someserver.com, but your frontend is configured to be called over http://awesome.someserver.com.

You need to set the path to the Stud.IP interface and the corresponding username and password.
